title: McDonald's slims down Happy Meal
text:
McDonald's slims down Happy Meal 8:32pm GMT - 01:09 
McDonald's removed cheeseburgers from U.S. Happy Meals and shrank french fry servings in McNugget Mighty to make its food for children healthier. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
McDonald's removed cheeseburgers from U.S. Happy Meals and shrank french fry servings in McNugget Mighty to make its food for children healthier. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
